summary: A deaf girl is brutalized by a murderous gang who are then hunted by her when the bloodthirsty spirit of an Apache warrior inhabits her lifeless body.
cast: Amanda Adrienne Smith|Marc Anthony Samuel|Rodney Rowland|Tom Ardavany|John Charles Meyer|Brionne Davis|Ronnie Gene Blevins|Kyle Morris|Joseph Runningfox|Donnelle Russell|Daniel Knight|Ed Fletcher|Jason Gurvitz|Kingo Ojeda|Peter Sherayko|Willow Hale|Bobby Field|Ernie Charles|Natalie Sutherland|Dan Kiefer|Sara J. Stuckey|Joshua Wright|Wolf Diaz|Rick Mora
title: Savaged
